oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of Confederate veterans reunion photograph
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Confederate veterans gathered at the Sam Shephard Park. Names include that of Pvt. Sam Forbes, Co. K, 7th Tenn. Cav., CSA, who enlisted in 1861 in Nashville and was shot in the head at the Battle of the Wilderness, then later rejoined his regiment; and was present at the surrender at Appomattox. More than fifty of the veterans are identified by their surnames.
